article: For most of the day construction worker Sidney Smith and his brother - in - law Joseph Chambers had been  _  along the banks of Lake Waco with little  _  . For several minutes the two men sat in the pickup  _  to decide whether they had happened to  come across  someone's bad practical joke or something far more serious.
